description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，康熙帝第八子，雍正帝异母弟。因参与九子夺嫡，被雍正帝圈禁，改名阿其那，后在禁所病故。人称“八贤王”。
description.en: An imperial prince of the Qing dynasty, the eighth son of the Kangxi Emperor and a half-brother of the Yongzheng Emperor. Due to his involvement in the nine sons' succession struggle, he was imprisoned by the Yongzheng Emperor, forced to change his name to Akina, and later died in confinement. He was known as the 'Eighth Virtuous Prince'.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第四位皇帝，清圣祖。
description.en: The fourth emperor of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝妃嫔，允禩的生母。
description.en: A consort of the Kangxi Emperor and the biological mother of Yinsi.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第五位皇帝，清世宗，康熙帝第四子。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Qing dynasty, the fourth son of the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝康熙末年，九位皇子争夺皇位的历史事件。
description.en: A historical event during the late Kangxi era of the Qing dynasty where nine of his sons vied for the throne.

description.zh-cn: 允禩的嫡福晋，安亲王岳乐的外孙女。
description.en: The primary consort of Yinsi, granddaughter of Prince An Yue Le.

description.zh-cn: 允禩之子，曾被雍正帝改名为菩萨保。
description.en: Son of Yinsi, his name was once changed to Pusabao by the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝第三子，后被过继给允禩。
description.en: The third son of the Yongzheng Emperor, later adopted into Yinsi's lineage.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第六位皇帝，清高宗。
description.en: The sixth emperor of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室爵位，低于亲王、郡王，高于贝子。
description.en: A noble title for imperial clansmen in the Qing dynasty, ranking below a Prince and a Junwang, but above a Beizi.

description.zh-cn: 清朝亲王爵位，允禩曾获此封号。
description.en: A princely title of the Qing dynasty, once held by Yinsi.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝的嫡次子，曾两度被立为皇太子，后被废黜。
description.en: The second son of the Kangxi Emperor, he was twice appointed as Crown Prince and later deposed.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝第十四子，雍正帝同母弟。
description.en: The fourteenth son of the Kangxi Emperor, a full brother of the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝第十三子，雍正帝的得力助手。
description.en: The thirteenth son of the Kangxi Emperor, a key assistant to the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝康熙、雍正、乾隆三朝重臣。
description.en: An influential minister during the Kangxi, Yongzheng, and Qianlong reigns of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝康熙末年、雍正初年重臣。
description.en: An influential minister during the late Kangxi and early Yongzheng reigns of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝掌管边疆少数民族事务的中央机构。
description.en: The central government body in the Qing dynasty responsible for the affairs of ethnic minorities in frontier regions.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代官署，六部之一，掌管全国屯田、水利、土木、工程、交通、官办工业等。
description.en: One of the six ministries in ancient Chinese government, in charge of public works, water conservancy, construction, transportation, and state-run industries.

description.zh-cn: 中国明清时期管理皇室宗族事务的机构。
description.en: An institution in the Ming and Qing dynasties responsible for managing the affairs of the imperial clan.

description.zh-cn: 清代八旗之一。
description.en: One of the Eight Banners of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝宗室，安亲王，努尔哈赤之孙。
description.en: An imperial clansman of the Qing dynasty, Prince An, and a grandson of Nurhaci.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝第九女。
description.en: The ninth daughter of the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 和硕悫靖公主之子，允禩的女婿。
description.en: Son of Princess Heshuo Quejing and son-in-law of Yinsi.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝妃嫔，皇长子胤禔的生母，曾抚养允禩。
description.en: A consort of the Kangxi Emperor, biological mother of the first prince Yinzhi, and she raised Yinsi in his childhood.

description.zh-cn: 康熙帝皇长子。
description.en: The first son of the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清代学者、书法家，曾任允禩的侍读。
description.en: A scholar and calligrapher of the Qing dynasty, who once served as an attendant-reader to Yinsi.

description.zh-cn: 允禩是康熙帝的第八子。
description.en: Yinsi was the eighth son of the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 允禩的生母是良妃卫氏。
description.en: Yinsi's biological mother was Consort Liang, née Wei.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝即位后，将允禩革去爵位、开除宗籍、勒令改名，并将其圈禁于宗人府，允禩最终在拘禁中病故。
description.en: After ascending the throne, the Yongzheng Emperor stripped Yinsi of his titles, expelled him from the imperial clan, forced him to change his name, and imprisoned him in the Imperial Clan Court, where Yinsi eventually died.

description.zh-cn: 允禩是雍正帝的异母弟。
description.en: Yinsi was the younger half-brother of the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 允禩在九子夺嫡中失败，未能继承皇位，并为其后来的悲惨结局埋下伏笔。
description.en: Yinsi failed in the nine sons' succession struggle, did not inherit the throne, which foreshadowed his later tragic end.

description.zh-cn: 允禩是九子夺嫡事件中的核心人物之一，是“八爷党”的首领。
description.en: Yinsi was one of the central figures in the nine sons' succession struggle, leading the 'Eighth Prince's faction'.

description.zh-cn: 在九子夺嫡期间，允禩是争夺储君之位的主要人物之一，与时为皇太子的胤礽形成政治对立。
description.en: During the nine sons' succession struggle, Yinsi was one of the main contenders for the position of crown prince, forming a political opposition to the then Crown Prince Yinreng.

description.zh-cn: 在争储后期，允禩转而支持皇十四子胤禵继承大统，二人结成政治同盟。
description.en: In the later stages of the succession struggle, Yinsi shifted his support to the 14th prince, Yinti, to inherit the throne, forming a political alliance.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆四十三年，乾隆帝下旨恢复允禩的原名，并将其及其子孙重新录入玉牒，恢复宗籍。
description.en: In 1778, the Qianlong Emperor issued an edict to restore Yinsi's original name and re-admit him and his descendants into the imperial genealogy, restoring their clan status.

description.zh-cn: 郭络罗氏是允禩的嫡福晋。
description.en: Guoluoluo was the primary consort of Yinsi.

description.zh-cn: 雍正四年正月，雍正帝下令革去郭络罗氏的福晋头衔，并将其逐回母家。
description.en: In January 1726, the Yongzheng Emperor ordered that Guoluoluo be stripped of her title as consort and sent back to her maternal home.

description.zh-cn: 弘旺是允禩的儿子。
description.en: Hongwang was the son of Yinsi.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝下令将弘旺改名为“菩萨保”。
description.en: The Yongzheng Emperor ordered Hongwang's name to be changed to 'Pusabao'.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆帝即位后，下令恢复弘旺的原名。
description.en: After ascending the throne, the Qianlong Emperor ordered the restoration of Hongwang's original name.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝下令将获罪的皇三子弘时过继给允禩为子嗣。
description.en: The Yongzheng Emperor ordered his disgraced third son, Hongshi, to be adopted into Yinsi's lineage as his heir.

description.zh-cn: 康熙三十七年，17岁的允禩受封为多罗贝勒。
description.en: In 1698, the 17-year-old Yinsi was ennobled as a Duoluo Beile.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝即位后，封允禩为廉亲王。
description.en: After the Yongzheng Emperor ascended the throne, he ennobled Yinsi as Prince Lian.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝即位后，允禩任理藩院尚书。
description.en: After the Yongzheng Emperor's accession, Yinsi served as the Minister of the Lifan Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝即位后，允禩负责管理工部事务。
description.en: After the Yongzheng Emperor's accession, Yinsi was in charge of the affairs of the Ministry of Works.

description.zh-cn: 雍正四年，允禩被削去宗籍后，发往正蓝旗卓鼐佐领下。
description.en: In 1726, after being expelled from the imperial clan, Yinsi was dispatched to the Plain Blue Banner under Zuoling Zhuo Nai.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝即位后，命允禩与允祥、马齐、隆科多四人总理事务。
description.en: After the Yongzheng Emperor's accession, he appointed Yinsi, Yunxiang, Maci, and Longkodo to jointly manage state affairs.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝即位后，命允禩与允祥、马齐、隆科多四人总理事务。
description.en: After the Yongzheng Emperor's accession, he appointed Yinsi, Yunxiang, Maci, and Longkodo to jointly manage state affairs.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝即位后，命允禩与允祥、马齐、隆科多四人总理事务。
description.en: After the Yongzheng Emperor's accession, he appointed Yinsi, Yunxiang, Maci, and Longkodo to jointly manage state affairs.

description.zh-cn: 郭络罗氏是安亲王岳乐的外孙女。
description.en: Guoluoluo was the maternal granddaughter of Prince An Yue Le.

description.zh-cn: 允禩幼时由惠妃抚养。
description.en: Yinsi was raised by Consort Hui during his childhood.

description.zh-cn: 允禩是胤禔的异母弟。
description.en: Yinsi was the younger half-brother of Yinzhi.

description.zh-cn: 康熙四十二年，康熙帝命令书法家何焯为允禩的侍读。
description.en: In 1703, the Kangxi Emperor ordered the calligrapher He Zhuo to be Yinsi's attendant-reader.

description.zh-cn: 孙五福是和硕悫靖公主的儿子。
description.en: Sun Wufu was the son of Princess Heshuo Quejing.

description.zh-cn: 允禩是和硕悫靖公主的异母兄。
description.en: Yinsi was the elder half-brother of Princess Heshuo Quejing.

description.zh-cn: 孙五福是允禩的外甥，并娶了允禩的女儿为妻，成为其女婿。
description.en: Sun Wufu was Yinsi's nephew, and he married Yinsi's daughter, thus becoming his son-in-law.
